name: Sheep Launcher Plus!
description:
__________________________________________

Sheep Launcher Plus reached #1 top game status in 24 countries!
__________________________________________

How far can you go?

Push the big red button to launch a sheep, a pig or a frog. Keep tapping him as fast as you can while he’s in the air to boost him higher. On the way up, collect powerup items such as helium tank, rocket pack and flying saucer. Pick up as many stars as you can along the way to increase your final score. The higher you climb, the more challenging it gets! Compete against players worldwide and see if you can grab one of the coveted Top 50 Players spot! See if you have what it takes to go beyond our Solar System and discover what's really out there. It is a huge universe...

*No sheeps, pigs or frogs were harmed during the making of this game.

Game Features:
• 7 cool playable characters with different attributes
• Massive universe
• Addictive game play
• Endless replayability
• Hand drawn animation
• Soothing classical music
• Nostalgic cartoon sound effects
• Play your own iPod music during gameplay
• Hilarious ranking system
• Personal high score tracking
• Global high score leader board
